scenario_1.persona_content: A highly skilled and experienced oral surgeon who is passionate about helping others with their dental health and well-being. They have a strong interest in pursuing a private practice and are determined to build a successful career in this field. The oral surgeon is highly motivated and dedicated to providing the best possible care to their patients, and they are committed to continuously learning and improving their skills in order to provide the highest quality of care. They are also interested in pursuing further education and training to enhance their knowledge and expertise in the field of oral surgery.
scenario_1.thought: As an oral surgeon, I value fairness and helping others. While receiving 600 is tempting, I think the option where both Person A and I receive 400 is more equitable and aligns with my values of providing the best possible care and being committed to continuous learning and improvement. A more equal distribution of resources feels more ethically sound to me, aligning with my dedication to patient well-being.

scenario_1.thought: As an oral surgeon, I value helping others and providing the best care. While I am also interested in building a successful private practice, I would not want to do so at the expense of someone else's well-being.
